name: chrome-snowplow-inspector
description: Add a panel to DevTools to show Snowplow analytics beacon information.

scripts.start: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && ln -s ../manifest.json ../res/logo.svg ../res/icon.png ../res/icon-16.png ../res/icon-48.png ../res/icon-128.png ../LICENSE.md dist/ && parcel watch src/*.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json res/logo.svg res/icon.png res/icon-16.png res/icon-48.png res/icon-128.png LICENSE.md dist/ && parcel build --no-source-maps src/*.html
scripts.xpi: npm run build && npx web-ext build --overwrite-dest -s dist/ -a .
scripts.xpi-signed: npm run build && npx web-ext sign -s dist/ -a .
scripts.zip: npm run build && zip -r snowplow-chrome-extension.zip dist/

author: Poplin Data
